channel.title: Making a certain item train range and hit higher then other range weps?
channel.description:
Is it possible? Because I made rune c bow an item on my server with crossbow animation,karil walk animation,verac stand animation, etc. Problem is, it trains melee whenever I shoot.
I added my bow to the (usebow) list of item id's but then after I use the bow, it shoots like a short\long bow. I want it to train range, POSSIBLY hit higher by range bonus and not strength bonus(that's what is it set on right now) and keep the animations I set for it.
If I have to change all of the range items so it would hit higher by range bonus, I will do it. I just want rune c bow hit 40 or so, have spec I have already set, and keep the animations I set while training range. Making it the best bow

item.title: Making a certain item train range and hit higher then other range weps?
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

[quote=“Soul Breaker, post:2, topic:183936”]First of all, do you have the interface for attack style?

And another one, what kind of source are you using?[/quote]
Yes I have accurate,rapid,long range and I am using hiyascape v1 aka czar(pimpscape)

Read full topic
